course_title: Topics in Afr American Studies: Sports in US History.
class_notes:
(Same as HIST 385 6)
(This course will examine the history of American sports, thematically, focusing on: politics, race, gender, religion, and nationalism. We will explore the social, cultural, economic, and political forces relevant to sports history that have shaped and reshaped American identities since the nineteenth century. Course topics include (but are not limited to): community building, race relations, grassroots protests, and histories of professional sports and collegiate athletics.)
course_description: This course explores one of a wide range of topics pertaining to the African American experience in the fields of human and civil rights, social and literary texts, and the social sciences.
